description: Gets the latest analytics data for all your current active assessments.

nested_items.name: activeAssessmentsCount
nested_items.description: The number of active assessments in Audit Manager.

nested_items.name: noncompliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as non-compliant on the lastUpdated date. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Fail ruling, or collected from Config with a Non-compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: compliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as compliant on the lastUpdated date. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Pass ruling, or collected from Config with a Compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: inconclusiveEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence without a compliance check ruling. Evidence is inconclusive when the associated control uses Security Hub or Config as a data source but you didn't enable those services. This is also the case when a control uses a data source that doesn't support compliance checks (for example: manual evidence, API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: assessmentControlsCountByNoncompliantEvidence
nested_items.description: The number of assessment controls that collected non-compliant evidence on the lastUpdated date.

nested_items.name: totalAssessmentControlsCount
nested_items.description: The total number of controls across all active assessments.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time when the cross-assessment insights were last updated.
